channel.title: RS07Remake | Remaking RuneScape (Oh god another Remake)
channel.description:
Hey.
I started making an RSPS a few months ago, but never posted it on Mopar. So, might as well do it now. I plan on making this be a remake of RuneScape in 2007. This will not be perfect. I will aim for perfection, but perfection is not possible. Anyway, here I will be posting updates, and pictures and such. I may or may not release this.
Base: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532694.msg3893588.html#msg3893588 (Blank Delta V2)
I know Delta is somewhat frowned apon, but my goal is to make it as effiecient as possible.
RECENT UPDATES:
[code]
-Downloaded Source
-Added the real music tab [thanks to incognito <3]
-Changed some in-game text
-Worked on region-based music (I got Book of Spells to play in Lumby Swamp and Autumn Voyage to play when you're on that aroad to Varrock)
-Added 300 NPC's (Tons of work :P )
-Modified NPCHandler so more NPC's can be in-game with less lag
-Added Door Handler
-Started a Cooking Base
-Started a Smithing Base
-Worked on Smithing some more. Added the interface to smith items
-Added Idle Logout
-Fixed X-Logging (player waits until finished with combat then disconnects >=) )
-Worked on Agility
-Added full Gnome Agility Course
-Worked on Woodcutting
-Perfected Combat just a bit more
-Added auto casting with all staffs
-fixed a bug I found
-Added firemaking base
-Added more sexy music
-uploaded a video of Gnome Course, will post later
-Created a StaffZone (I know, I shouldn't have, I was bored)
-Worked on smithing, works AMAZINGLY! it's almost 100%!
-Added Mining Guild Requirement
-Started making Skill interfaces (you click on a skill and it shows what you can do at certain levels :P )
-Added Quest Interfaces [100% credits to Azuuurree <3 awesome Job on it btw]
-Started Crafting Base
-Added tons of new pics + Got them to be higher quality
-Started Fletching
-Added Cooking Base
-Worked my heart out with cooking, almost perfect! I will post pictures when I have the time.
-Added 100% all Emotes
-Added Updated NPC's
-Added Newer Maps
-Skillcape Emotes 100%
-Changed Gameframe
-Changed it back
-Kinda Stopped doing this. :\ Might get back into it.
[/code]
UPDATE LOG: (Credits to Vault for Layout)
Combat
Correct Animations Blocks when being attacked Different styles of attack give different experience for the correct skills + Good Combat formula
Magic
Correct spell animations 99% of spells work (All except god spells) Autocasting works Good Magic Formula
Ranged
All bows/arrows work Correct formula 1/3 of the arrows disapear (just like in RuneScape) Poison Arrows Work
Prayer
Correct bone burying animations + experience given Overhead Prayers work (they show the prayer above the players head) All Prayers work, with correct bonuses Bone on Alter Action!
Mining
Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting
Smithing
All bars can be made All bars can be smithed All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
Fishing
All fish can be caught Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations Correct Fish Catching Algorithms
Cooking
All fish can be cooked All meats can be cooked Grinding wheat into flour Pies Pizza Stew Misc. cooking recipes Correct burning formula Cooking gauntlets Lumbridge cooking range bonus Correct animation and timing used
Woodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees are cuttable Correct fell chance algorithms
Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
Agility
Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable All obstacles Correct animations used
Herblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Weapon Poisoning Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
Thieving
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Correct animations and graphics used
Crafting
Cow Hide Tanning Leather Crafting Jewelry Enchanting
Runecrafting
Use of the Abyss All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras work
Fletching
All logs can be fletched Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) Can string bows Can make arrows
Slayer
All slayer masters Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks Slayer gem working All equipment working Correct requirements for slayer monsters
Farming
Adding...
Music/Sounds
Get music/sound packets Get music/sound playing All areas have music All sounds added
Miscellaneous
Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) Added Mining Guild Requirement +the ladders work to get to the guild itself Started Adding Skill Interfaces Started Adding Quest Interfaces
Minigames
Castle Wars Tzhaar Waves (I Don't know what they are called) :P
Quests
Cooks Assistant Romeo and Juliet
PICTURES:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8W9v0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SclyN.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q0ClY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/M7T38.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3sjLk.png[/img]
Album with 30 pics: http://imgur.com/a/2J8Ry#1

item.title: RS07Remake | Remaking RuneScape (Oh god another Remake)
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

Dj_:

If you continue with this is i might have to have babies with it. lol Nice job dude, keep up the good work. Love older revisions.

Ik. I hate all RS revisions that are after the graphic update (#508 I believe) I love the old school.

@DaMatt I make them the best I could. I always upload them as .bmp’s. What is the highest quality picture format?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

Hey.

I started making an RSPS a few months ago, but never posted it on Mopar. So, might as well do it now. I plan on making this be a remake of RuneScape in 2007. This will not be perfect. I will aim for perfection, but perfection is not possible. Anyway, here I will be posting updates, and pictures and such. I may or may not release this.

Base: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532694.msg3893588.html#msg3893588 (Blank Delta V2)

I know Delta is somewhat frowned apon, but my goal is to make it as effiecient as possible.

RECENT UPDATES:


-Downloaded Source

-Added the real music tab [thanks to incognito <3]

-Changed some in-game text

-Worked on region-based music (I got Book of Spells to play in Lumby Swamp and Autumn Voyage to play when you're on that aroad to Varrock)

-Added 300 NPC's (Tons of work :P )

-Modified NPCHandler so more NPC's can be in-game with less lag

-Added Door Handler

-Started a Cooking Base

-Started a Smithing Base

-Worked on Smithing some more. Added the interface to smith items

-Added Idle Logout

-Fixed X-Logging (player waits until finished with combat then disconnects >=) )

-Worked on Agility

-Added full Gnome Agility Course

-Worked on Woodcutting

-Perfected Combat just a bit more

-Added auto casting with all staffs

-fixed a bug I found

-Added firemaking base

-Added more sexy music

-uploaded a video of Gnome Course, will post later

-Created a StaffZone (I know, I shouldn't have, I was bored)

-Worked on smithing, works AMAZINGLY! it's almost 100%!

-Added Mining Guild Requirement

-Started making Skill interfaces (you click on a skill and it shows what you can do at certain levels :P )

-Added Quest Interfaces [100% credits to Azuuurree <3 awesome Job on it btw]

-Started Crafting Base

-Added tons of new pics + Got them to be higher quality

-Started Fletching

-Added Cooking Base

-Worked my heart out with cooking, almost perfect! I will post pictures when I have the time.

-Added 100% all Emotes

-Added Updated NPC's

-Added Newer Maps

-Skillcape Emotes 100%

-Changed Gameframe

-Changed it back

-Kinda Stopped doing this. :\ Might get back into it.

UPDATE LOG: (Credits to Vault for Layout)

Combat

Correct Animations
Blocks when being attacked
Different styles of attack give different experience for the correct skills + Good Combat formula

Magic

Correct spell animations
99% of spells work (All except god spells)
Autocasting works
Good Magic Formula

Ranged

All bows/arrows work
Correct formula
1/3 of the arrows disapear (just like in RuneScape)
Poison Arrows Work

Prayer

Correct bone burying animations + experience given
Overhead Prayers work (they show the prayer above the players head)
All Prayers work, with correct bonuses
Bone on Alter Action!

Mining

Emptying and refilling rocks
All ores can be mined
Correct pickaxe finding and animations
Prospecting

Smithing

All bars can be made
All bars can be smithed
All equipment can be produced
Correct animations, interfaces and objects used

Fishing

All fish can be caught
Correct item requirements
Fishing spots located all around the world
Correct animations
Moving fishing locations
Correct Fish Catching Algorithms

Cooking

All fish can be cooked
All meats can be cooked
Grinding wheat into flour
Pies
Pizza
Stew
Misc. cooking recipes
Correct burning formula
Cooking gauntlets
Lumbridge cooking range bonus
Correct animation and timing used

Woodcutting

Stumps and regrowing trees
Correct hatchet finding
Correct hatchet animations
All trees are cuttable
Correct fell chance algorithms

Firemaking

All logs light able
Adding and depleting of lightened logs
Ashes appear after logs burn out
Correct animations
Clipped

Agility

Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable
All obstacles
Correct animations used

Herblore

Correct animations
Herb Identifying
All potions can be made
Correct first and secondary ingredients
Weapon Poisoning
Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)

Thieving

NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula
Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards
Correct animations and graphics used

Crafting

Cow Hide Tanning
Leather Crafting
Jewelry Enchanting

Runecrafting

Use of the Abyss
All altars working
Correct multiple crafting
Use of Pouches included
Talismans “pull” to altars
Tiaras work

Fletching

All logs can be fletched
Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)
Can string bows
Can make arrows

Slayer

All slayer masters
Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks
Slayer gem working
All equipment working
Correct requirements for slayer monsters

Farming

Adding…

Music/Sounds

Get music/sound packets
Get music/sound playing
All areas have music
All sounds added

Miscellaneous

Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)
Added Mining Guild Requirement +the ladders work to get to the guild itself
Started Adding Skill Interfaces
Started Adding Quest Interfaces

Minigames

Castle Wars
Tzhaar Waves (I Don’t know what they are called)

Quests

Cooks Assistant
Romeo and Juliet
